views.markdown:
This item is now Free.

Compatible with iOS 10

Bring Slide To Unlock Back To iOS 10.

Slide To Unlock.
Allow user to disable lockscreen scrolling.
Allow sliding up ti open camera.
"Press to unlock" can be disabled.
Weather widget can be added to lock screen.

Configure options from Settings.

This item is now Free. "Press To Unlock" can be disabled with Classic Mode Now.
Added language support in settings page of Chinese, Simplified. (Thanks to @小宋99 @xapenny).
设置页面加入中文简体支持（感谢@小宋99、@xapenny）。
Fixed some layout problem when receive notifications on lock screen.(If you have some problem about it on plus model devices, contact me please.)


Fixed some problems about slider in classic mode.
Changed the font and animation of the "Slide To Unlock" text in classic mode.
Custom text now can work with classic mode.(not only supported Roman alphabet but also other characters, even emoji.)
Fixed some layout problems about classic mode.
Fixed some problems when playing music with classic mode.
Fixed some problems when slide to unlock with passcode set and classic mode enabled.


Added a new lock screen style called "Classic". (Beta)
Added an option to remove blur bar.
Added an option to use black font.
Fixed some problems with notifications.
Fixed some problems with media player.
Slider's image can be changed by users now.
